pli-tv-bu-vb-sk51:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā kosambiyaṃ viharati ghositārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk51:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarena brāhmaṇena saṃghassa payopānaṃ paṭiyattaṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk51:7.3: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhu saṃghaṃ ārabbha davaṃ karissatī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk51:7.4: “saccaṃ kira tvaṃ, bhikkhu, saṃghaṃ ārabbha davaṃ akāsī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk51:7.7: kathañhi nāma tvaṃ, moghapurisa, saṃghaṃ ārabbha davaṃ karissasi.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk51:7.8: Netaṃ, moghapurisa, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk51:7.11: “na, bhikkhave, buddhaṃ vā dhammaṃ vā saṃghaṃ vā ārabbha davo kātabbo.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk51:7.13: Atha kho bhagavā taṃ bhikkhuṃ anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā dubbharatāya … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk51:7.14: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk51:9.2: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca surusurukārakaṃ bhuñjati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
